original_text: Baasha did things that the Lord said were evil. He did the same sins that Jeroboam had done. He also caused the Israelites to do those bad things.
korean_text: 바아사가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 여로보암의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: Baasha did things that the Lord said were evil.
sentences.korean_translation: 바아사가 여호와께서 악하다고 하신 일을 행하였으며

sentences.original_text: He did the same sins that Jeroboam had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여로보암이 행한 모든 죄를 따라 행하고

sentences.original_text: He also caused the Israelites to do those bad things.
